title: AtmA rAmA Ananda
sahitya:
AtmA rAmA Ananda ramaNA accutA kEshavA hari nArAyaNA


anupallavi

  pUtta malar pOlE punnkai purivAi pUraNa shatiyai mazhaiyenap-pozhivAi


caraNam    duSTa rAkSasarai dUruDan koivAi duruvAdi munivarai niruparAi sheivAi
aSTa mA siddhigaL anbarukkaLippAi avaniyaik-kAttiDa avatarippAyE
